generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Entity Dragonchargeplayer Behavior
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Allows this entity to attack a player by charging at them. The player is chosen by the "minecraft:behavior.dragonscanning". Can only be used by the Ender Dragon.

fields.title: Active Speed
fields.description: The speed this entity moves when this behavior has started or while it's active.

fields.title: Continue Charge Threshold Time
fields.description: If the dragon is outside the "target_zone" for longer than "continue_charge_threshold_time" seconds, the charge is canceled.

fields.title: Flight Speed
fields.description: The speed this entity moves while this behavior is not active.

fields.title: Target Zone
fields.description: Minimum and maximum distance, from the target, this entity can use this behavior.

fields.title: Turn Speed
fields.description: The speed at which this entity turns while using this behavior.
